npc.speach: The last Keeper, Trina, walks throughout a major city while being escorted by armed guards. Suddenly, a mysterious figure runs by Trina, stealing her coin purse. Her guards quickly give chase.

Eventually, they corner the thief into an alleyway. The thief, seeing no alternative, readies themselves for battle. With astounding quickness, the guards are defeated and the thief removes his mask to cool himself. Trina approaches the boy, who is clearly no more than 13 years old.
That is none of your concern. Stay back and leave me be!

npc.name: Trina
npc.speach: Now. Now. Don't worry. I am not going to harm you. I wanted to offer you a proposition. You dispatched my personal guards so easily. Obviously, you know how to fight. Perhaps you would like to leave the streets behind and become my bodyguard.
But I just stole money from you. Why are you being so kind to me?

npc.name: Trina
npc.speach: If you begin to question why someone does something or why they don't, the world can become a very complex place. I know that you are starving and desperate; there's no way any sane man would attack the Keeper's entourage otherwise. Now, what is your answer?
Sure, it's not like I have a better option.
The boy hands the coin purse to Trina and helps the guards to their feet. Trina and company return back to her home in the city.

The years have since gone by and the boy grew stronger as a person and as a warrior as a result from his training. For years,he rarely left his mistress' side and protected her from countless dangers.
